   19: %%
   20: -module(runtime_tools_SUITE).
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: %% Test server specific exports
   24: -export([all/0, suite/0]).
   25: 
   26: %% Test cases
   27: -export([app_file/1, appup_file/1, start_stop_app/1]).
   28: 
   29: suite() ->
   30:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   31:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   32: 
   33: all() -> 
   34:     [app_file,
   35:      appup_file,
   36:      start_stop_app].
   37: 
   38: 
   39: app_file(_Config) ->
   40:     ok = test_server:app_test(runtime_tools),
   41:     ok.
   42: 
   43: appup_file(_Config) ->
   44:     ok = test_server:appup_test(runtime_tools).
   45: 
   46: start_stop_app(_Config) ->
   47:     ok = application:start(runtime_tools),
   48:     Sup = whereis(runtime_tools_sup),
   49:     true = is_pid(Sup),
   50:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process,Sup),
   51:     ok = application:stop(runtime_tools),
   52:     receive {'DOWN', Ref, process, Sup, shutdown} -> ok end.
